blog.description: Welcome to Jodie Comer Source, a blog dedicated to the lovely British actress, Jodie Comer. Here you'll find all of the latest news, photos, and gifs of Jodie. We track #jodiecomersource!

blog.description: Multifandom Fangirl. Here's my 18+ trash: masterlist or check out my works on ao3! Sometimes I create fanart & fanmixes too.

summary: would love to see you provide me with characters/ships that remind you of: river - bishop briggs / old ceremony - matthew and...
question: would love to see you provide me with characters/ships that remind you of: river - bishop briggs / old ceremony - matthew and the atlas / the good samaritan - the pierces
answer:
Oh, I don’t think I know any of these songs… so let’s get to discovering some good stuff! Thanks for the ask.

River - Bishop Briggs

Ok, what did I just hear. I love this song now. Fave line: “Choke this love ‘til the veins start to shiver.” Hot damn. Very visual, powerful… and kinda hot, lol! Especially with that beat. No, I don’t have a choking kink. Anyway, the lyrics are great. And violent! It sounds like quite a turbulent relationship, very dramatic and passionate. Hmm…

Like a river, like a river / Shut your mouth and run me like a river

How do we fall in love? / Harder than a bullet could hit you / How do we fall apart? / Faster than a hairpin trigger

Tales of an endless heart / Cursed is the fool who’s willing / Can’t change the way we are / One kiss away from killing

Shut your mouth, baby, stand and deliver / Holy hands, will they make me a sinner? / Like a river, like a river / Shut your mouth and run me like a river / Choke this love ‘til the veins start to shiver / One last breath ‘til the tears start to wither / Like a river, like a river / Shut your mouth and run me like a river

Ship: Hannibal Lecter and Will Graham from Hannibal (NBC), from Will’s POV. If we’re doing dark and dramatic, why not opt for my favorite murder husbands? Though, in all sincerity, and the show’s wonderful ambiguity, I have to question whether Will is letting Hannibal choke him to death as a suicide pact Will made with himself to get out of a tricky situation, or whether he’s merely enjoying getting choked with tears drying on his cheek (see, I imagined that visual from the very vivid description of the lyrics), or… you know, it’s both. Le petite mort. Le grand mort. What a toss up! Will either comes or he dies, whichever it is, the man is all in. 

Old Ceremony - Matthew and the Atlas

Hm, sweet lyrics. I love the bit “flowers woven in your hair,” because it somehow reminded me of an episode on The Magicians, though I think I am imaging it… rather than it actually happening, but (whatever) I am sticking with that link! 

And when the winter drifted in / I was not expecting / You to hold on for so long / You to hold on for so long

The day the white deer died / The snow turned red as wine / I know how hard we tried / I know how hard we tried

And on that day you came to me / Flowers woven in your hair / Felt the ocean on your skin / The promise it would bring

Cause I remember you / And you remembered me / We’ll feel this way again / We’ll feel this way again

And now we’re filled with hope again / Yes we’re filled with hope again / I whispered in your ear / Like you whispered into mine

I’ll be here when we’re old / When our story’s almost told / And all those things we’ve made / Will slowly start to fadeIt’s just an old ceremony / Fade / It’s just an old ceremony

Ship: Quentin Coldwater and Eliot Waugh from The Magicians, from Quentin’s POV. The way I picture it… after our lovely fuckup magicians destroy the monster-not-god-why-am-i-not-a-god inside of Eliot-not-Eliot, there’s a lot of darkness, a lot of guilt, and a lot of hurting left inside of Eliot. Though he never caused all that misery himself, he will still have to deal with its repercussions and all the feelings it leaves behind. Throughout this show, Eliot has repeatedly been there for Quentin during emotional moments where he needed to be comforted (whether that was through alcohol and partying, or slithering to the ground and moping, or merely holding each other)… 

Quentin will return the kindness to Eliot. But this time… they’ve both got their alternate timeline in their memories (because the writers made it so-fuck rules) when they lived a long and happy life together as lovers and companions… and eventually Eliot will feel that way again, and he will be filled with hope again, and Quentin will whisper comforting words into his ear, like Eliot had whispered it into his. Quentin will still be there when they’re old again, when their story’s almost told for a second time, and all the painful things will start to fade. And they can remind each other of the beautiful things. 

I’m spinning this into a happy song with a happy ending, ok bye.  

The Good Samaritan - The Pierces

Lol, you know how to pick your songs. There’s many ways to go with this song, but I like the bits of confusion over secrecy and ethics so… screw male pronouns. 

He was moving towards me like a deadly hurricane / Well, the eye was on the sparrow but I was in the rain / Rolled into town and blew a smoke into my eyes / Well, it was only for a moment but I was hypnotized

Why can’t I know the secrets that you’re keeping from me?

Stop! Don’t tell me now / 'Cause there is only one day more / And I don’t know how / To bring to life the things that meant so much to me before / There is danger in your words that I cannot ignore

Why must I conceal the secrets I’ve been keeping from you?

Sorry thing it was that fell out of your hands / But then you take me in your armsAnd become the good Samaritan / Time flies by like planes above / And worries need a death / 'Cause I lose you more and more / With every breath

Why can’t I know the secrets that you’re keeping from me? / Why must I conceal the secrets I’ve been keeping from you?

Ship: Eve Polastri and Villanelle from Killing Eve, from both their POVs. Now, hear me out. It works, ok, lol. First paragraph (+ question that follows) is V, next paragraph (+ question that follows) is Eve, final paragraph is V again (and their questions being asked together at the end). They’ve caught each other’s eyes, which is a little dangerous for both of them (though mostly Eve lol), and there’s so many questions, so many secrets, still between them… yet it never seems to stop them, because both women are so, so very curious.

Warning: This Is NOT A Spoiler-Free Blog

The tumblr for farfarawaysite.com. We are a fan run site that posts high quality tagless photography from many current and past fantasy, action and adventure, science fiction, horror and historical television shows. Our tumblr will only highlight certain updates. Visit our website daily for a full listing of new content. We hope you do enjoy all your visits.

tags: Everything i've heard about the season so far makes me excited
summary: A new female assasin is going to be introduced and Eve is going to have to grapple with the question of whether she's an...
body:
A new female assasin is going to be introduced and Eve is going to have to grapple with the question of whether she’s an assassin expert in general or just a Villanelle expert. And if it’s the latter, what does that say about her? 🤔

And Villanelle is probably gonna be jealous and want to kill this new woman for taking some of Eve’s attention.

Carolyn saying “Why are you and Villanelle so interested in each other?”

I can’t wait for this dysfunctional gay messiness 😂

And Villanelle is probably gonna be jealous and want to kill this new woman for taking some of Eve’s attention.

Carolyn saying “Why are you and Villanelle so interested in each other?”

I can’t wait for this dysfunctional gay messiness 😂

summary: hot take villanelle isnt a slytherin... she has no ambition she just likes chillin in her apartment, eating nice things,...
body: hot take villanelle isnt a slytherin… she has no ambition she just likes chillin in her apartment, eating nice things, obsessing over eve, and occasionally going out to kill people… shes a hufflepuff with her weird displays of unconventional loyalty imo
